titleStmt.title: His Majesties declaration, directed to all persons of what degree and qualitie soever, in the Christian world with a letter from divers godly ministers of the Church of England to the assembly of the Kirk of Scotland, shewing the cause of these troubles : and a list of the popish vicker-generalls, Jesuites, priests and fryers in England, and their names and places to them assigned, in the severall provinces of England and Wales, to exstinguish the Protestant clergie and religion and bring in and settle popery instead thereof.
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
